newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Atok Q1 ended Dec net loss 504,046 pesos.
newsitem.headline: Atok Q1 ended Dec net loss 504,046 pesos.

text.p: Holding firm Atok Big Wedge said on Thursday it registered a net loss of 504,046 pesos in the first quarter of its 1996/97 fiscal year which started on October 1.
The company did not give a comparative year-ago figure.
It said revenues in the first quarter were at 1.219 million pesos while expenses were at 1.723 million.
Atok, for long a dormant stock on the bourse, has stirred occasionally in the past two months on talk it is going into a property venture with a major Philippine company.
Last year, Atok changed its classification to holding firm from a gold mining firm.
